my_favourite_bni_story: A few months after joining BNI Infinity Chapter in Hyderabad, I had a 1-2-1 with a fellow member who was an architect. We hit it off and he said he might have a client needing UPVC windows soon. What I didn’t expect was that within one week, he sent three referrals my way—two of them were interior designers and one was a builder working on a 20-villa project. That single connection turned into over ₹10 lakhs in business over two months. But the real impact? Those three professionals now refer me regularly. One of them even invited me to co-host a workshop on energy efficiency in home design. That’s when I truly understood the power of BNI—it’s not just about referrals, but about building trust-based partnerships that keep giving.

my_business:
With 40 years of experience in sweet industry, Ravi sweets deals with all kinds of sweet requirements. With freshness assured, we are customizable and can cater high quantities for any celebration. Be it company anniversary or traditional wedding, basket packaging or premium packaging we serve all kinds of customers. With most of our jaggery based products, we also have healthy alternatives such as our sugar and jaggery-free best selling booster laddus. We also supply freshly-made customizable pickles.
www.ravisweets.com
top_product: Our Booster Laddu – a healthy, sugar-free sweet made with dates, dry fruits, seeds, and nuts. It’s rich in nutrients and loved by health-conscious customers. We also offer other top sellers like Protein Laddu, Dry Fruit Laddu, and custom festive sweet boxes.
ideal_referral: Corporate clients, event planners, and individuals or families celebrating special moments. This includes: Festival shoppers Health-conscious consumers Gift buyers Caterers and restaurants Wholesale buyers Exporters Anyone looking for customized, traditional, or healthy sweets for gifting, celebrations, or bulk orders is an ideal referral for me.
top_problem_solved: One of the biggest problems I’ve solved is helping customers enjoy sweets without compromising their health. Many people avoid traditional sweets due to sugar concerns or dietary restrictions. By creating customized, sugar-free, and nutrient-rich options like Booster Laddu and Protein Laddu, I’ve helped clients with specific health needs — such as iron deficiency or post-natal recovery — continue enjoying sweets guilt-free.
my_favourite_bni_story: I’ve received many valuable referrals from fellow BNI members, and each one has helped my business grow. But what gives me the most satisfaction is a particular referral where a lady with iron deficiency saw great improvement by regularly consuming our Booster Laddu. Hearing her health journey and knowing that Ravi Sweets could make a difference reinforced my mission to offer sweets that are both delicious and nourishing. It’s stories like these that make my BNI journey truly meaningful.

name: Rajesh Kumar
category: Finance & Insurance > Life and Disability Insurance
company_address: TATA AIA LIFE INSURANCE , Ground Floor, SS Fortune, Kukatpally,, H, Balaji Nagar Main Rd, Balaji Nagar, Kukatpally, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500072
my_business:
Proud to be an MDRT-qualified Life Insurance Advisor with Tata AIA—India’s leading insurer, ranked No.1 in MDRT agents nationwide and among the global Top 5. As an MDRT (Million Dollar Round Table) Advisor, I embody the gold standard of professional excellence, ethical conduct, and client-focused service in the insurance industry. My mission is to empower clients with trusted advice and innovative solutions, helping them achieve financial security, protect their loved ones, and realize their life goals with confidence.
Backed by Tata AIA’s premier agency model and world-class training, I am dedicated to delivering personalized financial guidance, building lasting relationships, and setting new benchmarks in client satisfaction. Whether you are planning for your family’s future, building wealth, or safeguarding your business, I am here to help you make informed decisions every step of the way.
Let’s secure your tomorrow, today—with the expertise and commitment that MDRT and Tata AIA's.
top_product: Life Insurance-Term Plan-MahaRaksha Supreme and Sampoorna Raksha Promise Pension-Fortune Gurantee Pension and Fortune Gurantee Retirement Ready Wealth and Investment-Param Raksha Pro Health-MediCare Premiere, and Select, and Elder Care products. Travel Insurance-Worldwide Plans Motor-Comprehensive 3+3 year plans.
ideal_referral: Financial Experts: Accountants, financial planners, and investment advisors. They work with clients who often need insurance to protect assets or plan for the future. Legal Professionals: Estate lawyers, family lawyers, and business attorneys. They help clients with life changes—like wills, trusts, or business planning—where insurance is important. Real Estate and Mortgage Professionals: Realtors and mortgage brokers. Homebuyers and property investors usually need home, life, or mortgage insurance. Other Insurance Agents: Specialists who handle only certain types like auto or property, and can refer clients needing broader coverage. Business Contacts: Bankers, commercial loan officers, HR consultants, and payroll providers. They connect you with business owners needing employee benefits, group health, or commercial insurance. Medical Professionals: Doctors and clinics. They often meet people needing health, disability, or critical illness insurance. Satisfied Clients and Business Owners: Happy clients who can refer family, friends, or business partners—especially after a positive claim experience or expert guidance. Clients facing big life changes (marriage, new home, starting a business). Business owners growing or protecting their company/staff. Families planning ahead for health, education, or legacy.
top_problem_solved: I successfully assisted a UK-returned client in repatriating ₹1 Crore from her UK pension, which had been stuck due to complicated cross-border regulations. Despite approaching several banks in India, she couldn't get clear guidance or solutions. I took the initiative to thoroughly understand her situation, received specialized training, and coordinated closely between my Mumbai head office and the UK pension provider, Aegon. By leveraging the QROPS (Qualifying Recognised Overseas Pension Scheme) facility, I ensured her pension was seamlessly transferred to India. The client was extremely relieved and satisfied, as these funds were crucial for her retirement, and I was able to provide the clarity and solution she was seeking.
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI is truly a value-driven organization, and one of its core values—Building Relationships—has made a profound impact on my career. My favorite BNI story centers on a meaningful connection I built with a fellow entrepreneur in my chapter. Beyond business, this person became a spiritual guide and mentor. Through our shared values and trust, I adopted aspects of his lifestyle and belief system, which inspired a deeper professional and personal bond. As our relationship grew, he saw the discipline and holistic approach I bring to every client—prioritizing not just financial security but also health, fitness, spirituality, and genuine connection. This mutual respect led to closing a significant business case: helping him secure his term and wealth insurance portfolio for an impressive 20 million. This experience didn’t just grow my business—it helped me qualify for an International Training Convention, further exemplifying the power of meaningful relationships. #BNI truly works. It’s not just about referrals—it’s about trust, shared values, and supporting each other's journeys, in business and beyond.
